attributes.action: Mainstream schools should not be allowed to take children with special educational needs if they cannot meet their needs. Schools should be able to say when they cannot fulfil the childs needs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children with special needs are being forced to remain in mainstream schools even when they emotionally and mentally cannot cope with it.Children with ADHD and Autism should not be put in mainstream schools they cant cope with the class sizes they cannot cope with the atmosphere in which they are being forced to deal with. This does not help their development in any way and makes the child extremely unhappy and does more damage than good to them.
